attributes.description: This vehicle arrived at G&C Auto Investments. Still in a excellent condition,Treat yourself of this nice automatic 4X4 bakkie ready for any challenge you put at it. with new tires. G&C Auto Investments has a rule that all our vehicles go through a major inspection, service and DEKRA Multi-point check. We also provide a 3 month mechanical warranty to give you peace of mind. G & C Auto Investments also fill up your vehicle with a full tank with your purchase. We can assist with extended service plans, maintenance plans, and warranties. Contact our friendly staff at G&C Auto Investments to arrange a professional and convenient service. We accept all Trade-in's and can assist you with Finance at all major Banks.

*Spare keys with remote central locking and alarm system
*Tyres still in excellent condition
*Towbar fitted
*Multi functional steering wheel with on board computer
*Electric windows and mirrors
*Reverse camera
*Dual SRS Airbags
*For more information feel free to contact our team, We also do finance through all major banks and blacklisted Clients welcome for rent to own options
*Trade ins welcome
